title: Plate, "Eighth of March 1955", 1955
markings: Marks: On underside: Konakovsky mark stamped in green underglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular, with eight-pointed medallion in center inscribed (in Russian) "1952 / 8 / March;" surrounded by border of orange flowers with leaves; thin gilded double outer band

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Eighth of March 1955", 1955.
1955. earthenware, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-39.
